text: The new sidebar beta is great however i’ve noticed this little appearance bug, nothing huge just the button seems to be fixed instead of collapsing with the sidebar

Hello :wave::skin-tone-4: Wondering if anyone has a solution...

Lots of companies would love to use HubSpot quoting with all the amazing features it has... however:

HubSpot quoting only works if your products are single-component rather than products with permutations - Bills of Materials (BOMs).

For example, you could have a car with 10 paint colours, 2 engine choices, and 4 alloy choices.  It wouldn't be feasible to have SKUs for every permutation in HubSpot. Ideally HubSpot would allow configurable products but failing that is there a workaround?

Many thanks in advance!

Hello all! We developed an integration with HubSpot and 3rd party product to be able to feed lead flows both sides including patients' treatment requests. However, when I examine the backend, I noticed that some treatment names in the properties field are coming with a '/t' in a way that is not present in others. I haven't encountered such an issue with the rest, but I'm experiencing a problem with six of them as shown in the image below. Has anyone encountered a similar issue before? Thanks in advance.
Hello, i have a problem with our landingpages on mobile devices. If the device has a low resolution, our company name gets split up in two rows. Is there a possibility, to block that?
Unsure, but could there be a space or tab on the label of these? You could check the properties and change the label if there is. Can’t say for sure though as I’ve not seen this.
Thank you <@U04FNHJ0U2J> The thing is, in properties there is no "/t" at the end of these words. And, we need to keep property names as it is, as it's requested from the partner.

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
